feed.title: Investbrain Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.0 - Initial release
entry.content: Tagging the first official release of Investbrain. Future releases will contain a full change history.

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: minor updates for landing page by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/6
  • Make ASSET_URL optional in env by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/10

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix:ensure portfolio is available on transactions page by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/12

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: fixes spelling mistake by @eltociear in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/13
  • fix: adds validation for transaction date (no post-dated transactions) by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/14
  • fix: sales quantity should use rounded float numbers by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/14
  • fix: skip dividend sync if most recent dividend was less than 24 hours ago by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/14

New Contributors

  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/13

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.4
entry.content:
Primarily this new release resolves the issues with multiple dividends being added for specific symbols (see #26).

What's Changed

  • fix: refresh dividends only once daily by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/30
  • Uses last dividend created date as start date instead of last dividend date by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/31
  • chore(deps-dev): bump axios from 1.7.3 to 1.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/16
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 5.3.5 to 5.4.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/17
  • chore(deps): bump laravel/framework from 11.30.0 to 11.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/29

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/16

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4
